person.note: Yuan(2) Haowen(2) [10074] His second daughter was a sorceress (nuguan). He died in his temporary residence in Zhending, but was buried in the lineage burial grounds in Dingxiang. Although appointed Hanlin Zhizhi gao in 1132, he never took this post because of fall of Jin. Yuan Haowen, WJ, fu, 1a-3a, nianpu. Multitude of references in WDY. WDY, 1, 28-30.From Hartwell's ACTIVITY table:1232: Appointed Hanlin Zhizhi gao (Drafting official of the Hanlin Academy).
